name: Composite Project for Separate Repositories
description:
The composite project allows you to develop multiple add-ons and applications in one IDE workspace. It enables transparent refactorings and eliminates the need to publish add-ons before using them in other add-ons and applications.

This template is best suited for the case where subprojects are stored in separate source code repositories.

The created structure contains the aggregating all project with a set of build scripts. Refer to its README file for more information.
